name: Vivian Carmine
description:
Vivian Carmine is an animal style visual novel featuring point and click gameplay. Something has been detected in this world which should not be here. Play as Vivian, an interdimensional investigator, and her partner Nicholas, to figure out the source of the disturbance and fix it.

Meet the duo:

Vivian:
A young, mildly inexperienced, but competent investigator dedicated to doing what she must to ensure order between the worlds is kept.

Nicholas:
Vivian's badge and partner. The more experienced of the two, he is dedicated to assisting Vivian in any way he can.

Features:
Point and click gameplay
Anime-style graphics

Explore the town, ask questions, and see what information you can gather!
